scripts.setup: shx mkdir build && shx mkdir build-server
scripts.start: shx rm -rf build-server && shx mkdir build-server && shx cp -R public/* build-server && env-cmd -f .env.server.local node scripts/serve.mjs
scripts.start:electron: shx rm -rf build && shx mkdir build && shx cp -R public/* build && env-cmd -f .env.electron.local node scripts/serve.mjs
scripts.build: shx rm -rf build-server && shx mkdir build-server && shx cp -R public/* build-server && env-cmd -f .env.server.prod node scripts/build.mjs && git rev-parse HEAD > version
scripts.build:electron: shx rm -rf build && shx mkdir build && shx cp -R public/* build && env-cmd -f .env.electron.prod node scripts/build.mjs && git rev-parse HEAD > version
